revision.text:
This page summarizes what we know about software support for SBGN languages. This knowledge comes from a variety of sources, and is necessarily incomplete. If your software is not listed below, or if you know of another effort, please post a message to sbgn-discuss@sbgn.org.
== Software tool assisting in supporting SBGN ==
The implementation of SBGN support in software tools may be facilitated by the use of an XML exchange format: [http://www.sbgn.org/LibSBGN/Exchange_Format SBGN-ML]. SBGN-ML can be processed and generated by a standard library: ''LibSBGN''. LibSBGN is a [http://www.sbgn.org/LibSBGN community project] and everyone is welcome to participate. For a very brief introduction to LibSBGN, check: [[SBGN_Software/LibSBGN]]
Discussions around SBGN-ML and LibSBGN take place on [https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/sbgn-libsbgn sbgn-libsbgn-discuss]
One can compare the rendering of SBGN-ML by the different software using the [http://libsbgn.sourceforge.net/render_comparison/ LibSBGN Render Comparison] site or [http://sysbioapps.dyndns.org/RenderComparison/ Frank Bergmann's Render Comparison] site.
== Software providing support for SBGN ==
The following is a list of software packages known to provide (or have started to develop) support for SBGN notations. As the list grows, we envision more sophisticated way of recording support, but we hope this will be useful nevertheless. The webpages and e-mail addresses (remove spaces) were correct at the time of recording.
* [http://arcadiapathways.sourceforge.net/ Arcadia] - Contact: alice . villeger @ manchester . ac . uk * [http://www.codeplex.com/athena Athena] - Contact: fbergman @ u . washington . edu * [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3137220/ Biological Connection Markup Language (BCML)] - Contact: duccio . cavalieri @ unifi . it * [http://code.google.com/p/biographer/ Biographer and jSBGN] - Contact: biographer @ googlegroups . com * [http://bioinfo-out.curie.fr/projects/binom/ BiNoM] - Contact: laurence . calzone @ curie . fr * [http://contraintes.inria.fr/BIOCHAM/ BIOCHAM] - Contact: biocham @ inria . fr * [http://www.ebi.ac.uk/biomodels/ BioModels Database] - Contact: biomodels-net-team @ lists . sourceforge . net * [http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/biopax/index.php?title=BioPAX-SBGN_Mapping BioPAX-SBGN Mapping] - Contact: demir @ cbio . mskcc . org * [http://www.biouml.org/ BioUML] - Contact: fedor @ developmentontheedge . com * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/byodyn/ ByoDyn] * [http://www.celldesigner.org/ CellDesigner] - Version 4.x supports SBGN Process Diagram Level 1. Contact: info @ celldesigner . org * [http://www.ebi.ac.uk/saezrodriguez/cno/cysbgn/ CySBGN] - A cytoscape plugin. Contact: emanuel @ ebi . ac .uk * [http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/~mwybrow/dunnart/ Dunnart] Contact: Sarah.Boyd @ infotech . monash . edu . au * [http://epe.sourceforge.net/SourceForge/EPE.html Edinburgh Pathway Editor] - Contact: asorokin @ inf . ed . ac . uk or Stuart Moodie: smoodie @ ed . ac.uk * [https://escher.readthedocs.org/en/latest/escherconverter.html EscherConverter] - Contact: Zachary King * [http://www.ipathways.org iPathways] - Contact: ghosh @ sbi . jp * [http://ipavs.cidms.org/ IPAVS] - Contact: pradeep @ cidms . org * [http://jjj.biochem.sun.ac.za/ JWS Online] - Contact: jls @ sun . ac . za * [http://www-ps.informatik.uni-tuebingen.de/mayday/wp/ Mayday] - Contact: battke @ informatik.uni-tuebingen.de * [http://metacrop.ipk-gatersleben.de/ Metacrop] - Contact: schreibe @ ipk-gatersleben.de * [http://mimoza.bordeaux.inria.fr/ Mimoza] - Contact: anna . zhukova @ inria.fr * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/apostrophe/ Netbuilder (Apostrophe)] - Contact: k . wegner @ herts . ac . uk * [https://bioinfo.lri.fr/research.html NetDraw] - pa @ lri . fr * [http://www.pantherdb.org/pathway/ PANTHER] - Contact: mi @ ai . sri . com * [http://www.pathvisio.org/wiki/SbgnPluginHelp PathVisio] - Contact: mvaniersel @ gmail . com * [http://www.innetics.com/ PathwayLab] - Contact: mats . jirstrand @ fcc . chalmers . se * [http://www.reactome.org Reactome] - Contact: robin . haw @ oicr . on . ca * [http://www.sbgn-ed.org/ SBGN-ED (Vanted)] - Contact: czauderna @ ipk-gatersleben . de or schreibe @ ipk-gatersleben . de * [https://github.com/iVis-at-Bilkent/sbgnviz-js SBGNViz] - Contact: ugur @ cs . bilkent . edu . tr * [http://subtiwiki.uni-goettingen.de/subtipathways.html SubtiPathways] - Contact: jstuelk @ gwdg . de * [http://sbmm.uma.es/ Systems Biology Metabolic Modeling assistant] - Contact: sbmm @ uma . es * [http://www.bilkent.edu.tr/~bcbi/pvs.html VISIBIOweb] - Contact: ugur @ cs . bilkent.edu.tr
